Hidden Markov Models & their Applications to Statistical Genetics Welcome

Hidden Markov Models & their Applications to Statistical Genetics Freddy Barragan, Spring 2021, Macalester College Welcome This is bookdown on discrete Hidden Markov Models & their applications to statistical genetics is my capstone! I made this for my Mathematical Statistics course taught by Kelsey Grinde. Big thanks to her for her guidance and help. Content was written and gathered by Freddy Barragan with appropriate citations for referenced materials. Note: I assume minimal mathematical background. If any equations or definitions look scary, feel free to skip over to the written content :) This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.
